attributes.action: hold a referendum on changing the voting system on or before the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the Prime Minister believes that a referendum on the voting system is the right thing to do, then why doesn't he hold one before the general election? The Tories are against the 'Alternative Vote' system and are highly unlikely to hold a referendum should they win the general election. 

The public deserve a voice on this matter and we should be allowed to have a referendum.
